description:
"I can't believe how much I learned The instructor is great and the lessons were so easy to follow." Sherie L.

Theres a reason it's the top OneNote course on Udemy. There's a reason for the rave reviews... sign up today to see why.

Fully updated for the most recent version, Microsoft OneNote - Like a Boss is a comprehensive course that takes students from complete newbie to guru with Microsoft's note taking and organizing software that's an integral part of the Office suite of applications.

In other words, after taking this course, students will be able to use OneNote... like a Boss.

The course includes approximately 7 hours of video instruction delivered in 100 separate lessons, making it perfect for learning the application from the ground up, or for going back to review/refresh on a specific skill.

Author and Microsoft Certified Instructor Brian Culp will give students a guided tour of the application's newest, most commonly used, and most powerful features.

Students of this course will learn how to:

  • create and manage OneNote notebooks
  • customize notebook settings and properties
  • manage page layout options and use templates
  • create To Do lists
  • search for contents within and across notebooks
  • insert screen clips and images
  • record audio and video notes
  • apply tags and search for tags
  • link to files and notebook pages
  • and much more.

Additionally, the objectives of this training will also prepare students for the Microsoft Office Specialist 74-421 Certification Exam.

By simply following along with the hands-on exercises, viewers of this course will be able to create a working notebook with multiple pages and sections, all from scratch, and all without the need to download course or demo files.

What's more, the results are guaranteed!

You'll have a better understanding of projects and Microsoft OneNote than ever before, or your money back. If you need to learn OneNote, and need to learn it fast, please enroll or watch a couple of sample lessons - it might just change the way you organize your ideas, your classes, or your business.
title: OneNote 2013/2016/365 - Like a Boss. The Definitive Course.
